授業方法: Lecture and discussion of reading assignments.

第1回: Introduction to Premodern Japanese Literature, Overview of the Course
第3回: Heian Literature I: Ki no Tsurayuki and the Development of Kana Literature (Tosa Diary & Kokinshū)
第4回: Heian Literature II: The Tale of Genji
第5回: Heian Literature III: Pillow Book & Sarashina Diary
第13回: Edo Literature: Matsuo Basho (The Narrow Road to Oku)
第14回: In this class, we will discuss the books themselves, rather than their contents. Students will try their hand at putting together a book in one of the traditional styles.
トピック.授業外学習2: Every week, we will discuss Japanese literature using English translations of important texts. There will be reading and visual materials for the topic provided by the instructor through LUNA. Students will be expected to read these materials before class and be prepared to actively discuss them.
